landing_page.description: Asymmetric layout. Hero section uses 'Black and White Podium' image as a subtle backdrop with heavy overlay. Large typography.

dashboard.description: High density. Stats cards, Match History list, and Player Profile packed tightly with 1px borders.

game_board.description: Absolute center. The board is the hero. Minimal distractions. Replay controls float at the bottom.

GameCell.style: h-24 w-24 md:h-32 md:w-32 flex items-center justify-center text-6xl font-['Outfit'] font-black cursor-pointer transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-white/5 border border-white/10
GameCell.interaction: Pressing creates a 'tactile' dip (scale-95). X is Electric Red, O is Volt Blue.

ReplayControls.style: Fixed bottom or floating panel. Glassmorphism style. Uses Shadcn Slider for timeline.

StatsCard.style: p-6 bg-charcoal border border-white/5 rounded-xl flex flex-col gap-2 hover:border-white/20 transition-colors

hero_background.description: Abstract black and white podium/arena for the main landing hero background. Apply 80% black overlay.

strategy_section.description: Chess/Strategy concept for the 'About' or 'Features' section background.

abstract_texture.description: Colorful abstract for 'Creative Mode' or specific game states if needed (use sparingly).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'recharts' if not present. Import the Google Fonts in 'index.css'.
2. THEME: Enforce Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to the root HTML element or body.
3. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for all 'frame' elements (Dialogs, Forms, Dropdowns). Use Custom CSS/Tailwind for the 'Game Board' to ensure fluid animations.
4. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for X/O appearance (scale-in + bounce) and for the Win Line drawing.
5. REPLAY: The Replay System must use a 'Command Pattern' approach visually. Show a list of moves on the side, highlight the active move.
6. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure 'Electric Red' and 'Volt Blue' have sufficient contrast against the 'Obsidian' background. Add 'aria-label' to all grid cells.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (cells, buttons, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for the main background; use solid Obsidian (#0A0A0A) or subtle noise texture.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Spacing should be generous (p-8, p-12) in the layout, but tight (gap-1, gap-2) within the Game Board grid for cohesion.
All buttons must have a 'hover' and 'active' state defined.
Use 'sonner' for game notifications (e.g., 'Player X Wins!').
